entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 5:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle this evening. A few flurries or drizzle beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
